rules: Code/Tech Data: JetBrains Mono. Use for IDs, dates, file paths, and status labels.

layout.spacing_system: Tailwind Scale (p-4, p-6, p-8, p-12, p-16)

grid_system.dashboard: Bento Grid (Mode A/B Hybrid). Grid cols 1 (mobile) -> 2 (tablet) -> 3 or 4 (desktop).

cards.hover: Border color shifts to Primary/50. Shadow-lg.

inputs.style: Shadcn Input. Dark background, light border. Focus: Ring-2 Ring-Primary.

upload_zone.interaction: Drag over: Border becomes solid + Primary Color + Glow.

modals.style: Glassmorphism overlay (backdrop-blur-sm). Content: Solid dark card.

effects: Tracing Beam: Animated gradient border for active cards.
Glassmorphism: For sticky headers and floating controls.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure 4.5:1 for normal text. Use APCA for large text.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible ring on all interactive elements.

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'Electric Obsidian' dark theme using Tailwind CSS variables.
Use 'Manrope' for all headings. Import it via Google Fonts.
Use 'JetBrains Mono' for any code snippets, file paths, or technical data.
Create a custom 'AppCard' component that uses the 'Tracing Beam' effect on hover.
Build the Upload Zone with a large, dashed border and clear drag-and-drop visual feedback.
Ensure the Dashboard uses a responsive Grid layout (1 col mobile, 3 cols desktop).
Do NOT use gradients for text. Keep text solid white or gray for readability.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI slop' (generic centered layouts). Use asymmetry and negative space.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
Do NOT apply universal transition (transition: all). Animate specific properties.
Do NOT center align the app container globally.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
